verbs.description: [ARG0: Allen Kofsky , Cleveland Orchestra musician] [R-ARG0: who] [V: played] [ARG1: the trombone , euphonium and bass trumpet for some of the group 's leading conductors] , died June 7 at age 92 .

[ARG1: Allen Kofsky , Cleveland Orchestra musician who played the trombone , euphonium and bass trumpet for some of the group 's leading conductors ,] [V: died] [ARGM-TMP: June 7] [ARGM-TMP: at age 92] .
